content.question: What are all values of p for which the series <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mrow> <msup> <mi>n</mi> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> <mi>p</mi> </mrow> </msup> <mo>+</mo> <mi>n</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42B0@</annotation> </semantics> </math> diverges?

choices.label: The series diverges for all p.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test to apply.
